title: What is U-Report?
content:
[Become a U-Reporter!][1]

U-Report is a free direct messaging tool designed to give young people and communities a chance to voice their opinions on issues that they care about, report on what is happening in their community and to receive messages with valuable, sometimes life-saving, information. Young people engage regularly on different issues that affect them answering questions through their phones or social media accounts. Results are visualized in a public website and UNICEF and partners use it to achieve positive change. 


  [1]: https://www.free.facebook.com/UReportindonesia/
